Online payment

Guest books online

Your guests can book online trough multiple channels like

  • OTA ( Booking.com, Expedia, Hotels.com etc)
  • GDS ( Travel agencies )
  • Your website (Wordpress, joomla, WIX, etc)

Guests Pays Online

The system can be setup to receive payments in multiple ways.

  1. Pay online directly after the booking process has been completed
  2. Pay by using the self check-in terminals.
  3. Pay later by saving a payment link.
  4. Agree to pay in the reception

Access Code By Email & SMS

When the system has identified that the guests has a valid claim to the room the access code will automatically be dispatched to the guests cellphone by email and sms.

5

Post Checkout

Personal Guest Assistant

The guest manage their stay trough the Personal Guest Assistant System. A link is sent by sms and email to their cellphone and from there they have multiple options

  • Extend stay
  • Buy late checkout
  • Order extra cleaning

Checkout

Guests that has paid in advanced will automatically be checked out once the time has passed. If the cleaning staff marks the room as cleaned before guests has checked out they will automatically checkout the guest to render the access useless.

Guest Survey

Ensure that you get the most out of your guests, automatically send surveys to your guests by email.

Post Checkout

The cleaning staff now gets a list of rooms to clean, they mark it as clean and the process can start again with the next guest.
